member.name: IPackageDebugSettings.ActivateBackgroundTask
member.param: The identifier of the background task to activate.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPackageDebugSettings.DisableDebugging
member.summary: Disables debug mode for the processes of the specified package.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPackageDebugSettings.EnableDebugging
member.summary: Enables debug mode for the processes of the specified package.
member.param: The command line to use to launch processes from this package. This parameter is optional.
Any environment strings to pass to processes. This parameter is optional.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPackageDebugSettings.EnumerateBackgroundTasks
member.summary: Gets the background tasks that are provided by the specified package.
member.param: The package full name to query for background tasks.
The count of taskIds and taskNames entries.
An array of background task identifiers. You can use these identifiers in the method to activate specified tasks.
An array of task names that corresponds with background taskIds.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPackageDebugSettings.GetPackageExecutionState
member.summary: Returns the current execution state of the specified package.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPackageDebugSettings.RegisterForPackageStateChanges
member.param: Package state-change notifications are delivered by the function on pPackageExecutionStateChangeNotification.
A unique registration identifier for the current listener. Use this identifier to unregister for package state-change notifications by using the method.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPackageDebugSettings.Resume
member.summary: Resumes the processes of the package if they are currently suspended.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPackageDebugSettings.SetTargetSessionId
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPackageDebugSettings.StartServicing
member.summary: Suspends and terminates the non-background portion of the apps associated with the specified package and cancels the background tasks associated with the package.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPackageDebugSettings.StartSessionRedirection
member.summary: Causes background tasks for the specified package to activate in the specified user session.
member.param: The identifier of the session which background tasks are redirected to.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPackageDebugSettings.StopServicing
member.summary: Completes the previous servicing operation that was started by a call to the method.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPackageDebugSettings.StopSessionRedirection
member.summary: Stops redirection of background tasks for the specified package.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPackageDebugSettings.Suspend
member.summary: Suspends the processes of the package if they are currently running.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: The system has successfully started suspending the package.
No process in the package is currently running, or another error occurred.

member.name: IPackageDebugSettings.TerminateAllProcesses
member.summary: Terminates all processes for the specified package.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPackageDebugSettings.UnregisterForPackageStateChanges
member.summary: Stops receiving package state-change notifications associated with a previous call to .
member.param: The notification to cancel. This identifier is returned by a previous call to the method.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPackageDebugSettings
member.summary: Enables debugger developers to control the life cycle of a Windows Store app, such as suspending or resuming.
